title: Ep 133: Romance Languages with Talia Hibbert
itunes:title: Ep 133: Romance Languages with Talia Hibbert
itunes:subtitle: Kate wonders how she's going to turn her home into a school and Doree learns firsthand the difference between her love language and her husband’s. Then, they're joined by romance author Talia Hibbert (Get A Life, Chloe Brown and Take A Hint, ...
description:
Kate wonders how she's going to turn her home into a school and Doree learns firsthand the difference between her love language and her husband’s. Then, they're joined by romance author Talia Hibbert (Get A Life, Chloe Brown and Take A Hint, Dani Brown) to talk about how Talia writes the characters she wants to see more of in romance novels, how she came to have an octopus tattooed on her thigh, and why she’s not sorry she loves pop songs. 


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com. Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything mentioned in this episode.
